directions: Brown the ground pork and ground sirlion in a medium pan. Add a  teaspoon of sereano pepper while browning the meat Season with kosher  salt and pepper.
Chop the onion, bell pepper and one Serrano pepper and place them in a large pot.
Open up and drain both cans of kidney beans and add them to the large pot.
Open up both cans of stewed chili style tomatoes and add them to the pot.
Drain the grease away from the browned meat and add the meat to the pot.
Pour in the tomato juice over the meat mixture.
Add kosher salt, black pepper, two table spoons of chili powder, and two teaspoons of ground cumin. Stir well.
Cook slowly over medium low heat for an hour. If it starts to bubble  turn down the heat. Taste during the cooking process to check the  seasoning add more to taste.
ingredients:
1 whole
                            - bell pepper 
 1 dash
                            - black peppers to taste
 4 tablespoons
                            - chili powder 
 2 cans
                            - chili style diced tomatos 
 1 tablespoon
                            - cumin 
 1 can
                            - dark kidney beans 
 1 pound
                            - ground pork 
 1 pound
                            - ground sirlion 
 1 dash
                            - kosher salt to taste
 1 can
                            - light kidney beans 
 1 whole
                            - serrano pepper 
 1 quart
                            - tomato juice 
 1 whole
                            - white onion
title: Tasty Chili

directions: Grill the steak to your specifications (rare is the best)
Cool and cut the steak into 1 inch slices
Toss together the arugula, tomatoes, and artichokes
Top with steak and drizzle the dreasing over dish and server
ingredients:
1 can
                            - artichoke hearts drained and cut
 6 cups
                            - arugula  
 6 tablespoons
                            - balasmic vinaigrette 
 1/2 pint
                            - cherry tomatos 
 16 ounces
                            - top sirloin steak
title: Steak And Arugula Salad

directions: Pre-heat grill or grill pan
Combine all the ingredients in a large bowl
Form into patties
Cook on grill or grill pan
Toast buns
Server
ingredients:
1 teaspoon
                            - black pepper 
 8 tablespoons
                            - bread crumbs 
 1 tablespoon
                            - dijon mustard 
 32 ounces
                            - ground turkey 
 1 cup
                            - low fat buttermilk 
 3 tablespoons
                            - minced green onion 
 4 whole
                            - whole wheat buns 
 3 tablespoons
                            - worcestershire sauce
title: Flavorful Turkey Burger
